title: Luxury house ideal as a commercial premises with a swimming pool.
details:
Luxury modern house ideal as a commercial premises
On Kirula Road with a road frontage, three story house is architecturally build , fully air conditioned four bed room en suite, has large living area, fully fitted pantry, large rooms, covered parking for two vehicles and a magnificent swimming pool.

Well constructed beautifully designed house is suitable for both domestic and commercial purpose.
